title: Sentimental Journey
synopsis: Sentimental Journey is a collection of twelve short stories about twelve different girls. Though unrelated, there is one common theme that binds the episodes together: each girl's bittersweet experience of first love.
characters: ['Endou, Akira', 'Sugihara, Manami', 'Morii, Kaho', 'Adachi, Taeko', 'Sawatari, Honoka', 'Ayasaki, Wakana', 'Hoshino, Asuka', 'Matsuoka, Chie', 'Nanase, Yuu', 'Nagakura, Emiru']
voices: ['Suzuki, Urarako', 'Toyoshima, Machiko', 'Mannaka, Yukiko', 'Okada, Junko', 'Suzuki, Mariko', 'Oda, Michiko', 'Okamoto, Asami', 'Yonemoto, Chizu', 'Nishiguchi, Yuka', 'Maeda, Ai']
